oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; Rivers; Engineering; Bridges; War
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Members of the 105th Regiment Engineers putting in a bridge across the Selle River on the road between Escaufourt & St. Martin-Reviere.
